name: Zugnaex
summary: Immerse yourself in Zugnaex. Compatible with DOOM and DOOM II, it blends classic FPS action with a modern user interface and a detailed heads-up display. Enjoy single-player campaigns and free* online multiplayer for epic battles. (* - requires DOOM)

name: Zup! 2: DLC
summary: A DLC of Zup! 2 that brings new cubes and 11 new levels to enjoy!

name: Zumba Fitness Core
summary: Rock your core and dance your way to toned, sexy abs with Zumba Fitness Core, featuring 40 new songs and routines, more than 30 international dance styles from around the world and hot new choreography that's designed to sculpt stronger abs through an exhilarating full body workout. Lose yourself in the music as celebrity Zumba instructors guide you through choreography set to contagious new Zumba fitness originals and a broader mix of smash hits from hot artists including Enrique Iglesias and Don Omar (full soundtrack to be announced at a future date).

name: Zumba Fitness World Party
summary: Take your work out to Brazil, Hawaii and beyond in this vibrant fitness journey packed with exotic rhythms and rich culture from around the world. Expand your horizons with 40+ high-energy routines, over 30 calorie-burning dance styles, and a red hot soundtrack featuring Lady Gaga, Pitbull, Daddy Yankee and more. Work your body as you set fitness goals, earn motivating rewards and dance with friends alongside your favorite celebrity Zumba instructors in the new World Tour mode. Transform your at home work out into a rockin' global fitness-party with Zumba Fitness World Party!

name: Zui's Witch Academy
summary: A boss rush roguelike-styled action game. You build a deck of 3 magical cards to take down one of many bosses. Each boss has an arena specifically tailored to them. Can you help Rysa graduate from Zui's Witch Academy with flying colors?

name: Zumba World: The Lost Marble Island
summary: Dash across the islands—match, blast, and reclaim the lost marble treasures!

name: ZuOnline
summary: Return to the legendary world of Zu Online - a martial arts MMORPG reborn. Explore ancient skies, master cultivation, and battle for immortality in a world inspired by Chinese mythology.

name: Zup! F
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zugzwang
summary: Chess. Love. Destiny. All the same things, really.

name: Zumba Garden
summary: Zumba Garden is a match-3 marble shooter puzzle game. Your goal is to protect your beautiful garden from evil golems. Special projectiles and other bonuses, which you upgrade by spending collected stars, are there to help.

name: Zurviv.io
summary:
2D battle royal packed into an intense 3-5 minute experience. No lobbies, no lengthy drop sequences. In Zurviv.io, you're always in the fight!

Choose the mode that fits your mood. Go it alone in solo mode, battle with a partner in duos, or field a four-person team in squads.

Loot, loot everywhere. Famous firearms, melee weapons, throwables, medical items, armor, scopes, and backpacks to hold it all. Raid an air drop to get the rarest loot!
Tired of looting the same set of static locations every game?

Zurviv.io features something no other Battle Royale offers: a completely new map in each game. Every rock, tree, building, bunker, and river spawns in a randomly chosen place using our intelligent map generation tech.

The Zurviv.io dev team is dedicated to keeping the game fresh and exciting. We believe in frequent updates and open communication with the community. Join us on Discord and say hello!

name: Zumba Aqua
summary: Get better in one of the most popular puzzle games. Shoot gems and try to complete all the levels with three stars in each level. This gem game is easy to play and addicting at the same time.

name: Zuido
summary: You visit the tunnels to shoot a psychic video, The deeper you go, the more strange sounds begin to echo. The camera caught an eerie shadow of a human figure.

name: Zup! 3
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zuma
summary: Survive the ancient temples of Zuma, the critically acclaimed action-puzzler from PopCap! Deep in the jungle lie hidden temples bursting with traps and trickery, and it's up to you to uncover their treasures. Fire magical balls from your stone frog idol to make matches of three or more and clear the deadly chain before it reaches the golden skull.

name: Zuìhòu de Xiū Xiān Zhě
summary: A simple and playable placing game where you can hang up and place and wait for a reward.

name: Zulkania
summary: Zulkania is a captivating role-playing game in which you explore a fantasy world filled with mysteries, legendary creatures, and epic quests. Take on the role of an adventurer and shape your destiny by developing your skills, battling powerful enemies, and uncovering the secrets of Zulkania. Your choices will influence the course of history in this ever-evolving universe. Prepare for adventure!

name: Zup! 8
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zup! 7
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zumba: Dragon's Marble Trial
summary: Unleash your dragon’s fire—match, blast, and master the marble trial!

name: Zumba: The Marble Shooter Tikki Adventure
summary: Get ready to blast your way through 200 vibrant and challenging levels in Zumba - The Marble Shooter Tikki Adventure.

name: Zup!: DLC
summary: A DLC of Zup! that brings new cubes and 22 new levels to enjoy!

name: Zumba: Marble Candy Rush
summary: Indulge your sweet tooth—match, blast, and reign in the candy rush!

name: Zubo
summary: Zubo is a 3D rhythm action game set in the vibrant and melodic universe of Zubalon. Players enter Zubalon to help the zany inhabitants, the Zubos, defeat a malicious mastermind and his army of dastardly Zombos.

name: Zumba: Soccer Marble League
summary: Get ready for kick-off in Zumba – Soccer Marble League! Match and blast marbles before they reach the goal! Unlock power plays and climb the league ladder!

name: Zugaran
summary: Zugaran is a casual first-person horror. You rent an apartment in Dreamtown for a business trip, but get trapped in a looping nightmare. Each night, you wake up to pee and face a new terror.

name: Zumba: Marble Zombie Invasion
summary: Chomp and blast marbles in a cute zombie invasion!

name: Zumba Fitness
summary:
Less of a workout and more of a party, the Zumba Fitness craze has helped millions of people shed unwanted weight through invigorating high-calorie-burning workouts. Now you can harness the benefits of Zumba right at home with this interactive exercise program. The one-of-a-kind Zumba model is based on easy-to-follow dance moves blended with addictive Latin and World Music rhythms.

Sculpt your body and burn excess fat with 30 routines designed and guided by Zumba creator Beto and an array of renowned Zumba instructors. Multiple skill levels help you learn the steps, then find more challenges as you go. The more precise your movements, the more electric the atmosphere gets.

name: Zuma Girls
summary: Zuma girl is a casual marble shooting game, which integrates RPG skills and strategies with traditional Zuma playing methods. You will meet three beautiful girls in the battle. Who is stronger or weaker? Only the brave survive to the end!

name: Zupay: Shadows of Independence
summary: They messed with your homeland. A violent demon saved you from death and now pushes you to get revenge. In this Hack and Slash, explore a revolutionary land, merge with the environment, and consume your enemies' fear to unleash the Zupay.

name: Zumba: Treasure of the Marble Sea
summary: Set sail on a marble-blasting adventure! In Zumba – Treasure of the Marble Sea, shoot and match marbles before they reach the end. Unlock upgrades, earn stars, and explore pirate worlds!

name: Zulu
summary: Zulu is an action-maze game by Firebird Software. Players control Wyatt Hunter, sent back in time to collect 100 Golden Masks while avoiding Zulu warriors and maze hazards. Shields provide brief protection, but survival depends on quick navigation and strategy.

name: Zup! Z
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zumania: Magic Casual Puzzle
summary: The unexplored colorful worlds of Zumania are full of adventure and mystery! Embark on an incredible adventure across magical worlds with a magical ballista. Explore the mysteries of ancient worlds and get all the exotic bonuses that will help you solve the puzzles!

name: Zumbi Blocks
summary: Build your own defense base with your friends in the quarantine zone and survive against zombies!

name: Zup! XS
summary: Experimental minimal physical puzzle with explosions.

name: Zup! Zero 2
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zunius
summary: Zunius - A psychedelic rogue-like bullet hell

name: Zueirama 2077
summary: Zueirama 2077 is an update to the game Zueirama, the humor game based in brazilian games now with an futuristic aesthetic.

name: Zupay: Sombras de la Independencia
summary: Zupay: Sombras de la Independencia is a 2D Top-Down single-player game with Hack-n-Slash mechanics. You will take on the role of a gaucho whose soul was taken by the Zupay, a God of Death. During Argentina's War of Independence, your job is to try to stop the advance of the royalists from Upper Peru who want to seize your sovereignty while also trying to fight against your new host, the Zupay.

name: Zula
summary: Zula is a free-to-play online first person shooter. In Zula you will discover real unique locations as Istanbul, Northern Iraq and other places of the Middle East, as well as indoor maps. You will totally immerse yourself in the world of Zula thanks to very realistic graphics.

name: Zup! 3: DLC
summary: A DLC of Zup! 3 that brings 11 new levels to enjoy!

name: Zup! 9
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zumery
summary: "Zoomers” is a visual novel that plunges you into the world of young dreamers who risk everything for their goal. Four guys - Kostya, Genka, Stas and “Bazuka” - decide to realize their dream: to open their own business. However, their plans collapse when a series of strange and dangerous events begin.

name: Zugzwang
summary:
Desire is a labyrinth. As a sex angel, you must help mankind meet each other in the neon darkness. Drink deep their juices, distill their pleasure into divinity. The absence of the witch does not invalidate the spell.

A gay chess-puzzle game inspired by sex magic, the history of censorship in the US, architecture, and the poetry of Emily Dickinson.

name: Zup! S
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zumba Fitness 2
summary:
Party yourself into shape!

Players can learn and perfect nine different dance styles: Reggaeton, Merengue, Salsa, Cumbia, Hip hop, Mambo, Rumba, Flamenco and Calypso as well as new routines including the Axe, Indian, Latin Pop, Bellydance and Pasodoble. led by Zumba creator Beto and celebrity instructors Gina Grant and Tanya Beardsley. New features include a calorie tracker, revamped gameplay, and graphical representations of the instructors.

name: Zuumtype
summary: Test your typing skills in this rhythm-based typing game.

name: Zurry: The Ritual Bat
summary: Zurry The Ritual Bat is an arcade game in which you play as Zurry, a bat sent out to gather ingredients for the Halloween Ritual scattered around worlds.

name: Zundamon Castle
summary: A very cute RTS! Modify the voxel ground and defend your castle with Zundamons! A game set in Japan's medieval period, created by Japanese developers.

name: Zurd Hunt
summary: In the year 2,000,000,009, a team of bounty hunters infiltrate a massive facility swarming with hostile AI. Can they find Zurd?

name: Zup! 2
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zup! X
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zup! 4
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zumba: Burn it Up!
summary:
Zumba is a global movement that brings the fun to fitness with over 15 million people taking weekly classes across 186 countries.

Get your fix of the Zumba program anytime, anywhere with high-energy routines and hip-shaking jams including chart-topping hits and Zumba originals. Use the Joy-Con controllers to track your movements and get rewarded for dancing with energy and flair.

name: Zuma's Revenge!
summary: Conquer over 60 levels by staying sharp and avoiding hidden traps. Slide and hop for smarter shots; hit targets for exotic bonuses; detonate new power-up balls; battle six imposing tiki bosses and guide your agile amphibian to victory in four all new game modes! Will you succumb to the perilous pitfalls, or can you tame the jungle in this PopCap ball-blasting challenge?

name: Zumbi Blocks 2
summary: Loot. Kill. Survive. Can you escape? Zumbi Blocks 2 is the official sequel to the 2013 free browser zombie game. Stuck on an island, cut off from the rest of humanity, you wake up. The secret to breaking free from this place lies asleep, underground. From the soil, zumbies emerge.

name: Zuma Deluxe
summary:
An enhanced version, called Zuma Deluxe, was released for Microsoft Windows and Mac OS X as well as an Xbox Live Arcade download for the Xbox 360 and a PlayStation Network download for the PlayStation 3. It is also included with the PlayStation 3 retail version of Bejeweled 3, along with Feeding Frenzy 2.

Survive the ancient temples of Zuma, the critically acclaimed action-puzzler from PopCap! Deep in the jungle lie hidden temples bursting with traps and trickery, and it's up to you to uncover their treasures. Fire magical balls from your stone frog idol to make matches of three or more and clear the deadly chain before it reaches the golden skull. Think fast and aim smart, or you'll be history in this action-packed puzzle challenge!

name: Zup! 5
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: ZukuRace
summary: ZukuRace is a futuristic racing game with sim physics. You take part in racing event somewhere on the Earth in optimistic future.

name: Zumatch
summary: Help Explorer Dakota Jane navigate herself in this classic jungle adventure. Match 3 balls or more together to advance further into the jungle. Use the bubble shooter to shoot balls to match its color to destroy them. Lots of power ups to help through her challenges as they get harder and harder.

name: Zugya
summary: Zugya is an Action Shoot-'em-up game, developed and published by Sprite, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Zumoubattoru
summary: Slap and push your way past the sumo wrestlers who are standing in your way of becoming the sumo champion!

name: Zulu Hour
summary: A vertically scrolling shoot 'em up.

name: Zuma Blitz
summary: Zuma Blitz is a popular Facebook game made by PopCap Games. Zuma Blitz updates the game of Zuma with minute-long rounds, boosts, and an emphasis on surpassing your friends' scores, the same way Bejeweled Blitz adapts Bejeweled for Facebook.

name: Zunou Taisen Live
summary: Zunou Taisen Live (lit. "Brain Battle Live") was a game that was included alongside the Xbox Live Starter Kit during the Xbox Live launch in Japan. It contains four board games that can be played over Xbox Live, including Othello, Go, Mahjong, and Shogi.

name: Zupapa!
summary: An action puzzle game where you play as a Zupapa, a strange creature that hurls tiny Zupipi characters at your foes. The more Zupipi on an enemy when he is trampled, the larger the explosion.

name: Zusar Vasar
summary: A Japan exclusive Dreamcast racing game

name: Zup! Y
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zup! 6
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zueirama
summary: Zueirama is a humor game, with pixelart graphics and retro music. In a world full of internet memes references.

name: ZuluWar!
summary: ZuluWar! is a turn-based, hex-grid wargame simulating the 1879 Anglo-Zulu War in South Africa. The player has the choice of playing as either the British colonial forces or the forces of the Zulu tribes. The game allows players to change how actual historical events played out.

name: Zup!
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zunou 4989
summary: Puzzle game developed by Enix in 1984.

name: Zumaji Delux
summary: Embark on a perilous journey through the ancient temples of Zumaji, concealed deep within the jungle and teeming with cunning traps

name: Zumbido Seele
summary: Indie arcade FPS singleplayer shooter where you fight against hordes of monsters and explore the map in search of equipment.

name: Zuria
summary: Build your own tank and battle with other players! Using building tool create unique shape, add weapons, movement and compete with other players in construction skills.

name: Zumba Marble Blast
summary:
An Exciting Color-Matching Adventure!
Get ready to blast your way through 200 vibrant and challenging levels in Zumba Marble Blast.

name: Zusi 3: Aerosoft Edition
summary:
Zusi 3 Aerosoft Edition is a train simulation for PCs, the professional version of which is also being used in railway companies for engine driver training purposes.

This game is identical to the game Zusi 3 Hobby, but the Aerosoft version has an English language manual available and uses Steam to distribute updates.

name: Zup! 5: DLC
summary: A DLC of Zup! 5 that brings new cubes and 11 new levels to enjoy!

name: Zumba Kids
summary:
Jump in and have a blast with Zumba Kids, the ultimate dance-fitness party that gets families moving together with fun, high-energy rhythms across 20 different dance styles!

-First video game based on the Zumba dance-fitness program designed specifically for Kids
-Encourages self-confidence and fitness, and enhances coordination
-Teaches you 20+ international dance styles across 30 easy-to-follow routines
-Party with up to 4 players; Move to hit music from Justin Bieber, Willow Smith and more!

name: ZunZun Block
summary: ZunZun Block is the third game in Taito's Block series. Again, the gameplay is similiar to Breakout's ball-and-paddle block breaking.

name: Zurarararush!!!
summary: Zurararush!!! is a twin-stick shooter that you can play easily! Wear a wig as a weapon and defeat the virus that mutated inside your body! Power up your character and wig and become stronger! Defeat a lot of enemies and feel good! It's an arcade-style casual game that you'll want to play every day.

name: Zulup
summary: You play the role of a ball moving on the inside of a circle. Along the way, collect regularly appearing points.

name: Zumba Royal Marble Shooter Mania
summary:
An Exciting Color-Matching Adventure!
Get ready to blast your way through 200 vibrant and challenging levels in Zumba Royal Marble Shooter Mania.

name: Zuma
summary: Unlicensed port of Zuma.

name: Zup! Q
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions. The player's goal to keep the blue ball on the platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level.

name: Zutto Atai no Turn!
summary:
This is a modified version of an English vocabulary memorization game that the author created in high school.
This game is a secondary production of Touhou Project.

name: Zulin Time
summary: Classical platformer inspired by early NES games, telling a story about hardships of Mr. Zulin: video blogger, sex symbol, and simply a swell guy. Take control over his 8-bit incarnation to save his old friend better known as "the dude from Devastation".

name: Zunzunkyou No Yabou
summary: ZnY is basically Parodius meets Space Invaders (a premise also done by Taito themselves with Space Invaders '95: Attack of the Lunar Loonies), except you control a statue instead of a spaceship and you fight within an enclosed arena instead of vertical space. It would be more akin to an arena shooter like Robotron: 2084, except your statue can only shoot straight upward. The stages themselves all seem to be themed around different parts of the world: The kabuki boss on the far-left represents Japan, the chef represents China and mainland Asia, the crusader knight stands for Europe, and the superhero on the far-right stands for America. Yet even outside of the Japanese stages, there's a distinctly goofy flair about the game that emphasizes screwy cultural stereotypes from a Japanese game company. The game's actual developer, Minato Giken, also helped work on the Game Gear version of Dynamite Headdy, one of the most fantastically insane Genesis platformers ever, and that same sort of unhinged design can also be seen in ZnY. You fight talk show hosts, salarymen, pandas, matadors, clowns, rock stars, and other outlandish opponents detailed in exaggeratedly comical fashions. The graphic design is definitely ZnY's strong suit, with its colorful characters and quite detailed playfields making high use of Sega's System C-2 hardware, the same processor behind Puyo Puyo.

name: Zumba Blitz
summary: Simple and easy to play point and shoot game. Aim carefully and clear all the marbles. Explore all levels and have fun.

name: Zusi 3 Hobby
summary: Zusi 3 Hobby is a train driving simulator focused exclusively on Germany. Its strong points are accurate physics and detailed simulation of cab controls and safety systems such as PZB, LZB and ETCS.

name: ZunderFury
summary: Fast-paced arena shooter with tons of different enemy types. You can play as one of two ships each with its own unique weapon to battle against vast amounts of baddies. The game also features upgrades and an achievement system.

name: ZuPs! Snow in Summer
summary: Waking up to a snowfilled surrounding the Foxbat "Daniel Fuchsermaus" and his friends go on a journey to figure out who is behind this snowstorm in the middle of summer and clean up all the Mana-Orbs left behind by the perpetrator.

name: Zunou Senkan Galg
summary:
Zunou Senkan Galg ("Brain Battleship Galg"), referred to as just Galg by the game's title screen, is a vertical-scrolling shoot-em-up in which the player must navigate a serious of canyon-like environments for missing pieces to a war machine. Each stage has at least one piece, so the player must visit them all in order to find the necessary number. In addition to this, there are numerous secrets hidden throughout the many stages of the game, and the player frequently has to choose between multiple paths which lead to different stages. The game advertises itself as a "RPG" on its box art, referring to this additional layer of complexity.

Like The Tower of Druaga, it is considered a historically important game in Japan for the amount of secrets and mysteries it contains and the subsequent difficulty involved in reaching the end without this hidden knowledge. Therefore, it was one of the earliest games for the Famicom to feature its own printed game guide for players to follow. Zunou Senkan Galg is almost entirely unheard of outside of Japan, however, and has never seen a release outside of its native country.

Though it was published by dB-Soft, the game was developed by a group named "Team Bioteckers". Galg is their only known video game credit.

name: Zumiman
summary: A retro-style game made up of pixel art. Control the main character and hero Zumi Man to fight Suwill, a monster that pollutes water sources. The weapon is a water balloon that explodes like a bomb and creates a stream of water. Clear the stage while exterminating Suwill with water balloons.

name: Zubash
summary:
Zubash is a physics action game blending "cooperation x battle". Experience unique gameplay, strategies of betrayal, and physics-driven miraculous plays. It's a user-friendly game perfect for fun times with friends and family.
Note: Supports local multiplayer only.

name: Zuma Legend VR
summary: Have you ever play Zuma in VR, and what if i tell you it is a First-Person perspective game? You will definitely have a lot of fun with this game shooting balls as if in reality, Now it comes, Let's go.

name: Zumba Fitness Rush
summary: Players can learn and perfect nine different dance styles: Reggaeton, Merengue, Salsa, Cumbia, Hip hop, Mambo, Rumba, Flamenco and Calypso as well as new routines including the Axe, Indian, Latin Pop, Bellydance and Pasodoble., led by Zumba creator Beto and celebrity instructors Gina Grant and Tanya Beardsley. New features include a calorie tracker, revamped gameplay, and graphical representations of the instructors.

name: Zulu Response
summary: Experience realistic combat gameplay from 1879 as you take command of your own squad of AI British soldiers or Zulu warriors in single, multiplayer or co-op. Configure AI to adjust their abilities and adjust game settings to create games that suit you.

name: Zup! Arena
summary: Zup! Arena is a multiplayer arcade game in which you have to fight with other players! Throw off all your opponents from the battlefield and become the "King of the mountain". Play alone or in a group with friends!

name: Zup! 4: DLC
summary: A DLC of Zup! 4 that brings new cubes and 11 new levels to enjoy!

name: Zup! Zero: DLC
summary: A DLC of Zup! Zero that brings 11 new levels to enjoy!

name: Zup! Zero
summary: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions
